name: simply daisy bookmark
sizes_available: this bookmark measures approximately 7.5" long by 1" wide, but you can customize the length.
notes:
what's better than reading? having a cute crochet bookmark to mark your page. i'm just kidding, nothing beats reading, but why not crochet yourself a bookmark just for fun? 

this bookmark uses 20 yards of cotton yarn and takes under 20 minutes to make. it's a 2-row pattern that uses the star stitch. 

this is the perfect project for beginners, book lovers, or crocheters looking for ways to use up their scrap yarn. 

there are step-by-step pictures for crocheting the bookmark, adding a tassel, and blocking it; as well as a complete video tutorial for extra support.

> the free pattern for the simply daisy bookmark can be found **[here!][1]**

> the complete video tutorial for the simply daisy bookmark can be found **[here!][2]**

> buy 2 patterns, get 1 free with coupon code: freepattern. add all 3 patterns to your cart, and use the coupon code. discount will be applied at checkout.

skill level: easy / advanced beginner

language: english

crochet terminology: us terms

stitches: star stitch

> other details:
* 4.0mm crochet hook needed
* 20 yards of any medium 4 worsted or dk 3 weight yarn can be used (preferably cotton)
* a tassel is added to the end of the bookmark, but this is optional. 
* the pdf is a beautifully formatted 9-page document with step-by-step pictures and instructions. 

i hope you enjoy making your bookmarks! 


  [1]: https://thispixiecreates.com/how-to-crochet-the-simply-daisy-bookmark-video-tutorial/
  [2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uzajhgk3_fq
